thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Could not want for more
thread.title_full: Could not want for more - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: kate c
title: Could not want for more
text: Stayed for two days and from start to finish we had a superb time, reception team where delightful and the quite room was fantastic spacious with luxurious decoration and a shower you never want to get out of. Centrally located with easy access to metro you could not ask for more from a city centre hotel.
